# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a value for more than $100. I am offering you this opportunity to own it for $115, which I believe is a fair and competitive price considering its worth and benefits. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $115. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $115
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
